definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_ticks</field></block><block type="controls_if" x="82" y="152"><mutation elseif="2"/><comment h="84" pinned="false" w="254">This example will test for a specific block below what is running the procedure. If it is true, then it will run what you place in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">PORTAL</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><value name="IF1"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.VOID_AIR</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO1"><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">PORTAL</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement><value name="IF2"><block type="compare_mcblocks"><value name="a"><block type="world_data_blockat"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value></block></value><value name="b"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">Blocks.CAVE_AIR</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO2"><block type="controls_if"><comment h="85" pinned="false" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.05</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_particle_multi"><field name="particle">PORTAL</field><value name="count"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="dx"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dy"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="dz"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">3</field></block></value><value name="speed"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></statement></block></xml>
